minimumAmunition.info: Minimum Amoumt of Amunition which is spawned in each pipe. If Number exceeds all itemslots, the max possible number is added.

maximumAmunition.info: Maximum Amoumt of Amunition which is spawned in each pipe. If Number exceeds all itemslots, no more than possible can be added anyway.

coinSpawnRate.info: The Chance of a coin to spawn in a field without any Amunition
